title: [Basalt Hillock, Precipice]
description: On the northwest, the trail skitters and dodges over the boulders choking a steep slope.  Below is a lower section of the plateau, dotted with lava pits and bordered by a sheer cliff wall on the east.  To the northwest, a huge stela of glaes towers high over the floor of the mesa.

On the northwest, the trail skitters and dodges over the boulders choking a steep slope.  Below is a lower section of the plateau, dotted with lava pits and bordered by a sheer cliff wall on the east.  To the northwest, a huge stela of glaes towers high over the floor of the mesa, casting an irregular shadow over the bubbling magma pits and rutted terrain.
